languages.text: "Позвольте мне продолжить". {n}Мелко шаркая ногами, префект выступает вперед.{/n} "Согласно приказу Теодоры фон Валанциус ОРД-037/ЗН, представителям Адептус Администратум и Адептус Арбитес дозволено распоряжаться Дворцом Правосудия, вести учет и сбор {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}десятины{/g} на территории протектората, а также расследовать все случаи, связанные с ее утаиванием, избытком и прочими отклонениями. Все эти права засвидетельствованы в договорах и актах, приобщенных к основному приказу. С ними вам, очевидно, еще предстоит ознакомиться в связи с вашим положением".

traits.locale_text: "Позвольте мне продолжить". {n}Мелко шаркая ногами, префект выступает вперед.{/n} "Согласно приказу Теодоры фон Валанциус ОРД-037/ЗН, представителям Адептус Администратум и Адептус Арбитес дозволено распоряжаться Дворцом Правосудия, вести учет и сбор {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}десятины{/g} на территории протектората, а также расследовать все случаи, связанные с ее утаиванием, избытком и прочими отклонениями. Все эти права засвидетельствованы в договорах и актах, приобщенных к основному приказу. С ними вам, очевидно, еще предстоит ознакомиться в связи с вашим положением".
traits.speaker: VC_Prefect

languages.text: "If I may continue for you." {n}The prefect steps forward, dragging her feet slightly.{/n} "As per the decree of Theodora von Valancius ORD-037/ЗN, the representatives of the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites are sanctioned to use the Palace of Justice, oversee {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}tithe{/g} collection in the protectorate, and review any and all cases of tithe avoidance, tithe exceedance, or other irregularities. These rights have been formalised in numerous pacts and statutes under the main decree — considering your new position, you may have yet to acquaint yourself with all these documents."
languages.original_text: "Позвольте мне продолжить". {n}Мелко шаркая ногами, префект выступает вперед.{/n} "Согласно приказу Теодоры фон Валанциус ОРД-037/ЗН, представителям Адептус Администратум и Адептус Арбитес дозволено распоряжаться Дворцом Правосудия, вести учет и сбор {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}десятины{/g} на территории протектората, а также расследовать все случаи, связанные с ее утаиванием, избытком и прочими отклонениями. Все эти права засвидетельствованы в договорах и актах, приобщенных к основному приказу. С ними вам, очевидно, еще предстоит ознакомиться в связи с вашим положением".

These rights have been formalised in numerous pacts and statutes under the main decree — considering your new position, you may have yet to acquaint yourself with all these documents."

These rights have been formalised in numerous pacts and statutes under the main decree — considering your new position, you may have yet to acquaint yourself with all these documents."

These rights have been formalised in numerous pacts and statutes under the main decree — considering your new position, you may have yet to acquaint yourself with all these documents."

These rights have been formalised in numerous pacts and statutes under the main decree — considering your new position, you may have yet to acquaint yourself with all these documents."

"If I may continue for you." {n}The prefect steps forward, dragging her feet slightly.{/n} "As per the decree of Theodora von Valancius ORD-037/ЗN, the representatives of the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites are sanctioned to use the Palace of Justice, oversee tithe collection in the protectorate, and review any and all cases of tithe avoidance, tithe exceedance, or other irregularities. These rights have been formalised in numerous pacts and statutes under the main decree — considering your new position, you may have yet to acquaint yourself with all these documents."

"If I may continue for you." {n}The prefect steps forward, dragging her feet slightly.{/n} "As per the decree of Theodora von Valancius ORD-037/ЗN, the representatives of the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites are sanctioned to use the Palace of Justice, oversee tithe collection in the protectorate, and review any and all cases of tithe avoidance, tithe exceedance, or other irregularities. These rights have been formalised in numerous pacts and statutes under the main decree — considering your new position, you may have yet to acquaint yourself with all these documents."

languages.text: « Si vous permettez que je prenne le relais... {n}La préfète s'avance d'un pas en traînant des pieds.{/n} Selon le décret ORD-037/ЗN de Théodora von Valancius, les représentants de l'Adeptus Administratum et de l'Adeptus Arbites sont autorisés à utiliser le palais de justice, à superviser la collecte de la {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}dîme{/g} au sein du protectorat et à traiter tous les éventuels abus, fraudes ou autres irrégularités. Les droits qui nous ont été concédés figurent noir sur blanc dans de nombreux pactes et lois et ont été rassemblés sous un même décret principal. Comme vous n'avez intégré vos fonctions que récemment, vous n'avez peut-être pas encore eu le loisir d'en prendre connaissance. »
languages.original_text: "If I may continue for you." {n}The prefect steps forward, dragging her feet slightly.{/n} "As per the decree of Theodora von Valancius ORD-037/ЗN, the representatives of the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites are sanctioned to use the Palace of Justice, oversee {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}tithe{/g} collection in the protectorate, and review any and all cases of tithe avoidance, tithe exceedance, or other irregularities. These rights have been formalised in numerous pacts and statutes under the main decree — considering your new position, you may have yet to acquaint yourself with all these documents."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous permettez que je prenne le relais... {n}La préfète s'avance d'un pas en traînant des pieds.{/n} Selon le décret ORD-037/ЗN de Théodora von Valancius, les représentants de l'Adeptus Administratum et de l'Adeptus Arbites sont autorisés à utiliser le palais de justice, à superviser la collecte de la dîme au sein du protectorat et à traiter tous les éventuels abus, fraudes ou autres irrégularités. Les droits qui nous ont été concédés figurent noir sur blanc dans de nombreux pactes et lois et ont été rassemblés sous un même décret principal. Comme vous n'avez intégré vos fonctions que récemment, vous n'avez peut-être pas encore eu le loisir d'en prendre connaissance. »

languages.text: «Si me permite continuar por usted...». {n}La prefecta da un paso adelante, arrastrando ligeramente los pies.{/n} «Según el decreto ORD-037/ЗN de Theodora von Valancius, los representantes del Adeptus Administratum y del Adeptus Arbites tienen permiso para usar el Palacio de la Justicia, supervisar la recolección de {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}diezmo{/g} en el protectorado y revisar todos y cada uno de los casos de evasión de diezmo, pagos excesivos de diezmo y otras irregularidades. Estos derechos se han formalizado en diversos pactos y estatutos contenidos en el decreto principal. Dada su novedad en el cargo, es probable que todavía necesite familiarizarse con estos documentos».
languages.original_text: "If I may continue for you." {n}The prefect steps forward, dragging her feet slightly.{/n} "As per the decree of Theodora von Valancius ORD-037/ЗN, the representatives of the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites are sanctioned to use the Palace of Justice, oversee {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}tithe{/g} collection in the protectorate, and review any and all cases of tithe avoidance, tithe exceedance, or other irregularities. These rights have been formalised in numerous pacts and statutes under the main decree — considering your new position, you may have yet to acquaint yourself with all these documents."

traits.locale_text: «Si me permite continuar por usted...». {n}La prefecta da un paso adelante, arrastrando ligeramente los pies.{/n} «Según el decreto ORD-037/ЗN de Theodora von Valancius, los representantes del Adeptus Administratum y del Adeptus Arbites tienen permiso para usar el Palacio de la Justicia, supervisar la recolección de diezmo en el protectorado y revisar todos y cada uno de los casos de evasión de diezmo, pagos excesivos de diezmo y otras irregularidades. Estos derechos se han formalizado en diversos pactos y estatutos contenidos en el decreto principal. Dada su novedad en el cargo, es probable que todavía necesite familiarizarse con estos documentos».

languages.text: “请允许我继续向您解释。”{n}行政官拖着不太灵巧的腿脚，向前迈了一步。{/n}“根据西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯夫人签署的ORD-037/ЗN号法令，帝国内政部与法务部成员拥有访问正义大殿的权限，监督冯·瓦兰修斯王朝什一{g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}税{/g}的征收工作，同时负责审查一切逃税、超标，或其他违规行为的相关案件。上述权利已经在主要法令条款之下的众多条约法规中得到了正式规定。不过，考虑到您才上任不久，您可能还没有完全熟悉所有相关法律法规。”
languages.original_text: "If I may continue for you." {n}The prefect steps forward, dragging her feet slightly.{/n} "As per the decree of Theodora von Valancius ORD-037/ЗN, the representatives of the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites are sanctioned to use the Palace of Justice, oversee {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}tithe{/g} collection in the protectorate, and review any and all cases of tithe avoidance, tithe exceedance, or other irregularities. These rights have been formalised in numerous pacts and statutes under the main decree — considering your new position, you may have yet to acquaint yourself with all these documents."

traits.locale_text: “请允许我继续向您解释。”{n}行政官拖着不太灵巧的腿脚，向前迈了一步。{/n}“根据西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯夫人签署的ORD-037/ЗN号法令，帝国内政部与法务部成员拥有访问正义大殿的权限，监督冯·瓦兰修斯王朝什一税的征收工作，同时负责审查一切逃税、超标，或其他违规行为的相关案件。上述权利已经在主要法令条款之下的众多条约法规中得到了正式规定。不过，考虑到您才上任不久，您可能还没有完全熟悉所有相关法律法规。”

languages.text: "Wenn ich an dieser Stelle einhaken dürfte." {n}Die Präfektin tritt leicht schlurfend vor.{/n} "Gemäß Dekret ORD-037/ЗN von Theodora von Valancius sind die Vertreter des Adeptus Administratum und des Adeptus Arbites befugt, den Justizpalast zu nutzen, die Erhebung des {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}Zehnts{/g} innerhalb des Protektorats zu überwachen und alle Fälle von Nichtentrichtung, Überschreitung sowie sämtliche anderen Unregelmäßigkeiten zu prüfen. Diese Rechte wurden in verschiedenen Pakten und Statuten unter dem Primärdekret zusammengefasst ... angesichts Eurer neuen Position müsst Ihr Euch mit all diesen Dokumenten möglicherweise erst noch vertraut machen."
languages.original_text: "If I may continue for you." {n}The prefect steps forward, dragging her feet slightly.{/n} "As per the decree of Theodora von Valancius ORD-037/ЗN, the representatives of the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites are sanctioned to use the Palace of Justice, oversee {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}tithe{/g} collection in the protectorate, and review any and all cases of tithe avoidance, tithe exceedance, or other irregularities. These rights have been formalised in numerous pacts and statutes under the main decree — considering your new position, you may have yet to acquaint yourself with all these documents."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich an dieser Stelle einhaken dürfte." {n}Die Präfektin tritt leicht schlurfend vor.{/n} "Gemäß Dekret ORD-037/ЗN von Theodora von Valancius sind die Vertreter des Adeptus Administratum und des Adeptus Arbites befugt, den Justizpalast zu nutzen, die Erhebung des Zehnts innerhalb des Protektorats zu überwachen und alle Fälle von Nichtentrichtung, Überschreitung sowie sämtliche anderen Unregelmäßigkeiten zu prüfen. Diese Rechte wurden in verschiedenen Pakten und Statuten unter dem Primärdekret zusammengefasst ... angesichts Eurer neuen Position müsst Ihr Euch mit all diesen Dokumenten möglicherweise erst noch vertraut machen."

languages.text: 「続けてもよろしいでしょうか」{n}総監は、やや足を引きずりながら一歩前に出た。{/n}「シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスのORD-037/3N令に従い、帝国行政局と高等裁定局の代表者は、司法宮を使用すること、保護領における{g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}租税{/g}徴収を監督すること、租税逃れ、超過、その他不法行為のすべてを確認することが認められています。こうした権利は、主法令に基づく幾多の協定および法の中で規定されています。新たなご職務に就かれたばかりであれば、まだすべての書類には目を通されていないかもしれませんが」
languages.original_text: "If I may continue for you." {n}The prefect steps forward, dragging her feet slightly.{/n} "As per the decree of Theodora von Valancius ORD-037/ЗN, the representatives of the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites are sanctioned to use the Palace of Justice, oversee {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}tithe{/g} collection in the protectorate, and review any and all cases of tithe avoidance, tithe exceedance, or other irregularities. These rights have been formalised in numerous pacts and statutes under the main decree — considering your new position, you may have yet to acquaint yourself with all these documents."

traits.locale_text: 「続けてもよろしいでしょうか」{n}総監は、やや足を引きずりながら一歩前に出た。{/n}「シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスのORD-037/3N令に従い、帝国行政局と高等裁定局の代表者は、司法宮を使用すること、保護領における{g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}租税{/g}徴収を監督すること、租税逃れ、超過、その他不法行為のすべてを確認することが認められています。こうした権利は、主法令に基づく幾多の協定および法の中で規定されています。新たなご職務に就かれたばかりであれば、まだすべての書類には目を通されていないかもしれませんが」

languages.text: "Müsaadenizle sözüme devam edebilirsem..." {n}Prefekt, ayaklarını sürüyerek öne çıkıyor.{/n} "Theodora von Valancius'un ORD-037/ЗN Sayılı Kararnamesi doğrultusunda Adeptus Administratum ve Adeptus Arbites mensuplarına Adalet Sarayı'nı kullanma, protektoradaki {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}aşar{/g} tahsilatını gözetme ve aşar ödemeden kaçınma ya da fazla ödeme yapma gibi usulsüzlükleri inceleme yetkisi verilmiştir. Bu haklar, birçok anlaşma ve yasayla resmîleştirilmiştir. Yeni makamınız düşünüldüğünde bu evraklar hakkında bilgi sahibi olmayabilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "If I may continue for you." {n}The prefect steps forward, dragging her feet slightly.{/n} "As per the decree of Theodora von Valancius ORD-037/ЗN, the representatives of the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites are sanctioned to use the Palace of Justice, oversee {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}tithe{/g} collection in the protectorate, and review any and all cases of tithe avoidance, tithe exceedance, or other irregularities. These rights have been formalised in numerous pacts and statutes under the main decree — considering your new position, you may have yet to acquaint yourself with all these documents."

traits.locale_text: "Müsaadenizle sözüme devam edebilirsem..." {n}Prefekt, ayaklarını sürüyerek öne çıkıyor.{/n} "Theodora von Valancius'un ORD-037/ЗN Sayılı Kararnamesi doğrultusunda Adeptus Administratum ve Adeptus Arbites mensuplarına Adalet Sarayı'nı kullanma, protektoradaki aşar tahsilatını gözetme ve aşar ödemeden kaçınma ya da fazla ödeme yapma gibi usulsüzlükleri inceleme yetkisi verilmiştir. Bu haklar, birçok anlaşma ve yasayla resmîleştirilmiştir. Yeni makamınız düşünüldüğünde bu evraklar hakkında bilgi sahibi olmayabilirsiniz."
